operations.summary: Get the list of Remote Sites.
operations.notes: Get the list of Remote Sites configured in the cluster.
Modify the configuration of the specified Remote Site.
A remote cluster to be used as a DR site.
Update the configuration of the specified Remote Site.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Remote Site.

operations.notes: Get the list of all Snapshots created in Remote Sites.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of DR Snapshots to retrieve

parameters.name: full_details
parameters.description: Whether to include consistency group / vm details

operations.summary: Get the list of events generated on any Remote Site.

operations.notes: Get the list of backlogged/pending replications in the cluster.
Delete a Remote Site with the specified name from the cluster.
Get a Remote Site with the specified name.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Remote Site.

operations.notes: Get the list of Snapshots created in a particular Remote Site.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of DR Snapshots to retrieve

parameters.name: full_Details
parameters.description: Whether to include consistency group / vm details

operations.summary: Get the list of events generated on a specified Remote Site.
Get all pending replications for the specified Remote Site.
operations.notes: Get the list of backlogged/pending replications for the specified Remote Site in the cluster.

operations.summary: Get the stats for a specified Remote Site.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.

create.dto.dr.BandwidthPolicyDTO.description: This DTO describes bandwidth throttling policies for different time schedules

default_bandwidth_limit.notes: This bandwidth is used in the time which is not covered by any of the existing schedule. Because every schedule will be having their own bandwidth limit defined.

policy_name.description: Name of the bandwidth Throttling policy.

bandwidth_limit.notes: At the time of policy consideration this bandwidth limit will be used to limit the bandwidth used.

days_selected.notes: This field describes the selected days of the week for this policy configuration.

end_time.notes: End time of the policy in milliseconds.

start_time.notes: Start time of the policy in milliseconds.

create.dto.dr.NetworkMappingDTO.description: This DTO describes network mapping from source to destination cluster based on network uuids

l2_network_mappings.description: List of L2NetworkMappingDTOs which contains name and hypervisor type of the mapped networks

uuid.description: Network mapping identifier for this remote site

remote_ip_address_ports.description: Dictionary having IPv4/IPv6 address as key and Port as value

remote_ip_ports.description: Dictionary having IP address as key and Port as value

vstore_name_map.description: Dictionary having map of local vStore to remote vStore

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chart_queries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

has_global_details.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

num_resolved_count.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parent_cause_id.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshooting_steps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metric_details.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metric_details.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severity_trails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severity_trails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparison_operator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

condition_type.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
condition_type.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metric_value_details.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metric_value_details.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metric_threshold_value.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metric_threshold_value.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metric_value.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metric_value.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred

get.dto.dr.BandwidthPolicyDTO.description: This DTO describes bandwidth throttling policies for different time schedules

default_bandwidth_limit.notes: This bandwidth is used in the time which is not covered by any of the existing schedule. Because every schedule will be having their own bandwidth limit defined.

policy_name.description: Name of the bandwidth Throttling policy.

policy_uuid.description: Uuid of the bandwidth Throttling policy.

bandwidth_limit.notes: At the time of policy consideration this bandwidth limit will be used to limit the bandwidth used.

days_selected.notes: This field describes the selected days of the week for this policy configuration.

end_time.notes: End time of the policy in milliseconds.

schedule_uuid.description: Uuid of the bandwidth schedule configuration.

start_time.notes: Start time of the policy in milliseconds.

get.dto.dr.NetworkMappingDTO.description: This DTO describes network mapping from source to destination cluster based on network uuids

l2_network_mappings.description: List of L2NetworkMappingDTOs which contains name and hypervisor type of the mapped networks

uuid.description: Network mapping identifier for this remote site

cluster_arch.description: The remote site architecture type. e.g: x86_64, ppc64le.

cluster_type.description: Nature of the remote site e.g: light compute, SNB.

remote_ip_address_ports.description: Dictionary having IPv4/IPv6 address as key and Port as value

remote_ip_ports.description: Dictionary having IP address as key and Port as value

vstore_name_map.description: Dictionary having map of local vStore to remote vStore

app_consistent_snapshots.description: Whether consistency group performs app consistent snapshots

related_entity_uuids.description: List of UUIDs of entities related to this VM e.g. the attached volume groups

vm_handle.description: Internal data-structure used by Cerebro to uniquely identify a vm Should it be displayed to user?

vm_id.description: Unique identifier of a virtual machine within a Hypervisor.

vm_name.description: Display name of a virtual machine

vm_power_state_on_recovery.description: Power state after vm recovery. Default power state is POWEREDOFF.
enum: Power state at time of snapshot

cerebro_error.description: Cerebro error code for why VM can't be recovered/migrated

reason.description: Human-readable string why VM can't be recovered/migrated

remote_site.description: Name of the remote site where this VM can't be recovered (Optional)
